fields_of_interest: Environment, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Transport
eu_initiatives:
We are member of the EUROVENT association and work in different standardisation commitees as well as different german mirror groups. 
 
We are member of the UNIFE association and work in different commitees to improve future mobility tasks and safety questions. 
 
We are active part of international conferences and symposiums to exchange knowledge in the european community.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Kalthoff is active in the developing, manufacturing and selling of air filter products for intake air filtration in buildings, processes and vehicules. Our goal is to protect humans from hasardous particles, substances and gases as well as antropological processes. We contribute to keep our food stuff air clean and hygienic.
relevant_communication: Member in the EUROVENT Product group filtration, member in the UNIFE SME commitee.
